attributes.action: Reform Parliment to a fairer more democratic parliment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many reasons that British Parliment needs reform, if not for the fact that the very people it serves could have a larger say over how it is run.

By starting with parlimentary reform, we can start to put the Great back in Great Britain for all UK citizens.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
